# Distribution of 18 Aquilaria species
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Load packages
library(readxl)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(rnaturalearthdata)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggforce)

# Import input file
file <- read_excel("C:\\Users\\edwin\\OneDrive\\anch1\\species_range\\Acombined.xlsx")
# Create a basemap from ggplot2
wmap <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")
ggplot(data = wmap) + 
  geom_sf(fill = "#B0B0B0") + 
  geom_point(data = file, aes(x = longitude, y = latitude, fill = Species), size = 2, shape = 21) + # Tree location
  geom_mark_ellipse(data = file, aes(x = longitude, y = latitude, color = Species, label = Species), size = 1, # Add eclipse to tree location
                    expand = unit(0.5,"mm"),
                    label.fill = "#e7e7e7"
                    ) + 
  coord_sf(xlim = c(88, 135), ylim = c(-8, 32), expand = F) + # "expand" removes padding
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = "dashed", color = "#B7B7B7") +
  labs(x = "Longitude", y = "Latitude") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#0cc0aa", "#18786a", "#7fdc64", "#728e24", "#bfcd8e", "#23980d", "#77d1fd", "#4787c9", "#26496d", "#646bde", "#fbacf6", "#a54984", "#fb48ad", "#6a10a6", "#bb54ed", "#fa1bfc", "#34f50e", "#754819")) + # Color of points
  theme(
    panel.background = element_rect(fill= "white"), # Panel background colour
    # panel.grid.major = element_line(colour = "#B7B7B7", linetype = "dashed", size = 0.5),
    panel.border = element_rect(color = "black", fill = NA),
    axis.line = element_line(color = "black", linetype = "solid") # # Axis lines colour
    )
```
